title: Kim Dotcom eligible for extradition to US, New Zealand High Court rules — RT News
text:
Kim Dotcom eligible for extradition to US, New Zealand High Court rules Published time: 20 Feb, 2017 02:54 Get short URL Internet entrepreneur Kim Dotcom and three co-accused in his case have been found eligible for extradition to the United States by the New Zealand High Court which upheld an earlier decision by the District Court. 
Justice Murray Gilbert has upheld on Monday a lower court decision that said there were enough grounds for Dotcom, Mathias Ortmann, Bram van der Kolk and Finn Batato to be extradited to the US. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
